title: @Riot, Delete My Account
body: Please remove my league of legends account.

replies.body: Sorry to hear you want to close your account.  :(  Hit us up in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new), and our account team will work on this directly with you.  They can help you with either disabling or deleting the account, and will respond back as soon as they can.
